history.content: You are a helpful robot assistant.
My name is friend. Thank you for watching.
Hi, friend! It’s great to chat with you. Thank you for being here! What can I help you with today?
My name is friend. Can you understand me?
Yes, I can understand you, friend! I'm here to help and chat with you. What would you like to talk about?
Got it, friend! I won't say your name again. How can I assist you?
My name is friend. What's my name again?
Your name is friend! How can I help you today?
Please remember that my name is headphone..
Got it! Your name is headphone now. How can I assist you today?
My name is headphone.. Can you tell me what's my name?
Your name is headphone! How can I help you today?
My name is headphone.. Okay, stop. I'm just gonna fix something.
No problem, headphone! Take your time. Let me know when you’re ready or if you need anything!
